descriptions.description:
We are hopeful that vaccinations will become available to most of the population by this summer.

**February 2021**\
The [vaccination trend](https://www.bloomberg.com/graphics/covid-vaccine-tracker-global-distribution/#us) is positive. Based on current data, we are confident that the vaccine will be available to the majority of the population by end of summer 2021.

**March 2021**\
California is scheduled to reopen public events by the beginning of April, another positive indicator that in-person events are no longer a distant memory, but something to look forward to once more.
